services.name: ApplicationCore
services.role: Infrastructure foundation — configuration, DB, orchestration, tracing & metrics, service registry.

services.name: HTTPAPILayer
services.role: Presentation layer — FastAPI handlers, validation and routing to business services.

services.name: DataORMLayer
services.role: Domain models and persistence (SQLAlchemy models + migrations).

services.name: BusinessServices
services.role: Core domain logic: planning, execution, queues, metrics, artifact generation.

services.name: AgentsAndPlanning
services.role: Agent implementations (Component + Capabilities) and plan lifecycle management.

services.name: DecisionComponents
services.role: LLM-based components for interpretation, routing, validation and reflection.

services.name: ToolsExternalIntegrations
services.role: Adapters to external systems and execution capabilities (Ollama, web search, code execution).

services.name: RegistryServiceDiscovery
services.role: Single source of truth for agents, capabilities, versions and lifecycle.

services.name: SecurityAuthPermissions
services.role: Authentication and authorization utilities for API and services.

services.name: MemoryConversationStorage
services.role: Storage and retrieval of agent memory and chat sessions.

services.name: OpsMigrations
services.role: CLI and scripts for schema migrations, seeding and DB maintenance.

services.name: UtilitiesObservability
services.role: Logging, metrics, tracing and helper utilities.
